recipes.label: Rush A Ritual for Quick Power
recipes.startdescription: If I bring the right trappings to a place with the right ambiance, I could perform a ritual to give myself great power. The actions I'd take might be...peculiar, and raise the suspicion of the general public.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Heart ritual in a Sleepless Space
recipes.startdescription: I have brought my implements, and the atmosphere is charged and ready.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Heart ritual in a Sleepless Space
recipes.startdescription: My dance steps will seem unorthodox to the crowd, but  I must truly beware if they see the organs within my dripping hands.
recipes.description: Music brightens, Influence blossoms. My feet strain to keep up with my racing heartbeat. All around me, the dancers begin to follow my rhythms too.
